Text: Can we get any confirmation on whether this is Victoria 2, the geo-political simulator? Whether it's virus free, and whether it's direct extract and play or whether it's nubbed up and requires mounting and disk management software or worse, C++ environments? :P
Following up to my post, on examining the torrent it appears to be an extract, install and play version with no fucking around. Downside is, no seeds or peers on for it, only six peers listed. :(
